adrFormatAddress: 1709 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10128-3267, USA

originalText.text: Sarah is my son’s speech therapist and he loves her! She is so patient, kind, and always takes the time to explain and discuss strategies that can help us get more speech out of him! I’m so happy to be working with Sarah and cannot thank her enough for how well she works with my son and with us!

text.text: Sarah is my son’s speech therapist and he loves her! She is so patient, kind, and always takes the time to explain and discuss strategies that can help us get more speech out of him! I’m so happy to be working with Sarah and cannot thank her enough for how well she works with my son and with us!

originalText.text: I worked alongside Sarah as a Speech-Language Pathologist and she is one of the most caring, thoughtful speech therapists I have met. Her therapy is effective and I highly recommend her to families looking for support.

text.text: I worked alongside Sarah as a Speech-Language Pathologist and she is one of the most caring, thoughtful speech therapists I have met. Her therapy is effective and I highly recommend her to families looking for support.

originalText.text: We have had a great experience with Sarah. She has helped our 14-year-old son with his diction, elocution, and articulation.  She is very professional; Sarah comes on time, ready to work with several different activities, and she leaves us with activities/homework for our son to work on. I would highly recommend her.

text.text: We have had a great experience with Sarah. She has helped our 14-year-old son with his diction, elocution, and articulation.  She is very professional; Sarah comes on time, ready to work with several different activities, and she leaves us with activities/homework for our son to work on. I would highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Sarah Shovlin is a fantastic SLP who provides the tools for anyone looking to improve their child’s language skills in an approachable way! Sarah is super friendly & warm with extensive knowledge on how to jumpstart communication. We are currently working with Sarah to improve our 17 month old daughter’s expressive language and already see an improvement. We look forward to more sessions with Sarah!
